mapper.select: SELECT ceo_notice_no AS ceoNoticeNo, user_id AS userId, ceo_notice_title AS ceoNoticeTitle, ceo_notice_contents AS ceoNoticeContents, ceo_notice_filename AS ceoNoticeFileName, ceo_notice_filepath AS ceoNoticeFilePath FROM ceo_notice WHERE ceo_notice_title = #{parameter}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rNum, n.* FROM( SELECT ceo_notice_no AS ceoNoticeNo, user_id AS userId, ceo_notice_title AS ceoNoticeTitle, ceo_notice_contents AS ceoNoticeContents, ceo_notice_date AS ceoNoticeDate, ceo_notice_filename AS ceoNoticeFileName, ceo_notice_filepath AS ceoNoticeFilePath FROM ceo_notice ORDER BY 1 DESC)n) WHERE rNum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
